amendment.description: Amendment clarified the legal standard for punitive damages as requiring malice or reckless indifference.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 4 printed in House Report 110-807 to clarify that a plaintiff must show intent (malice or reckless indifference) to recover punitive damages.
